body_html:
@anonym24 Also, we actually did used to have a native codepath for loading graphs, but simplified to use pure Java when we switched contrib/android to the Java API.

You could try resurrecting it, and if it resolves your issue then we can consider re-adding it as an augmentation to the default codepath.

@asimshankar If you have any comments on integrating this smoothly with the Java API.
